backend/main.mo: Actor handling user profiles and adminâ€‘protected CRUD operations for categories using access control and Map storage.
backend/migration.mo: Defines a migration that initializes lastCategoryId to 0 for upgrading actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking frontend files to features for updating category data handling and removing hardcoded lists.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of many frontend file paths to short descriptions of their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base, component, and utility setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up the TanStack Router and global toast viewport.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: UI for blocked admin access showing principal ID with copy support and a logout action.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminHeade: Admin header with navigation, sidebar toggle, and logout handling integrated with auth and Internet Identity.
Empty test file for SafeSelect component.
frontend/src/components/SafeSelect.tsx: Wrapper around Select enforcing sentinel values instead of empty strings and providing helpers for validation and API conversion.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating category data, converting backend bigint fields to UI numbers.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequireAdminNaviga: Redirects authenticated non-admin users to the admin page and exposes access status.
frontend/src/hooks/useSyncAuthFromIntern: Syncs the authenticated principal from Internet Identity into the auth store.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind setup plus light/dark theme variables and toast notification styles.
frontend/src/layouts/admin/DashboardLayo: Admin layout with header, sidebar, and main content area controlled by sidebar state.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRoute.tsx: Handles admin auth flow, showing login, loading, access denied, or the dashboard layout.
UI for listing, searching, creating, editing, deleting, and reordering categories.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DashboardHomePa: Admin home page with navigation cards to different management sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ExportPage.tsx: Placeholder page for store data export.
frontend/src/pages/admin/OnSaleProductsP: Placeholder page for managing on-sale products.
frontend/src/pages/admin/StoreDetailsPag: Placeholder page for editing store configuration.
frontend/src/router.tsx: Defines the TanStack router structure for admin routes and their child pages.
frontend/src/stores/authStore.ts: Zustand store managing authentication state, admin status, and persistence with recheck logic.
frontend/src/stores/toastStore.ts: Zustand store for creating, storing, and removing toast notifications with helper shortcuts.
frontend/src/utils/ApiResponseHandler.ts: Utilities for standardized API responses, BigInt-aware parsing, and error handling with retry rules.
frontend/src/utils/BigIntSerializer.ts: Functions for safely converting BigInt values and parsing JSON with automatic BigInt field handling.
frontend/src/utils/categoryNumeric.ts: Conversion utilities for safely converting numbers to bigint and vice versa, including tuple transformations.
frontend/src/utils/NumericConverter.ts: Helpers for safe number conversion, IVA validation, margin checks, stock handling, and price formatting.
Logs errors or messages with context and shows corresponding toast notifications.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL or session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom fonts, colors, radii, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the current project state, requirements, architecture, issues, and features for the Kelani Cosmetics admin panel build.
